name: Blueberry Vanilla
author: JayFury55
description:
Little
 color palette in the monochrome-ish purple spectrum that, when I look 
at it, makes me taste blueberry in my mouth. Full disclosure, it was 
generated by ChatGPT when I asked it for a palette.      
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
           EDIT: 117 Downloads?! It's a 
bit late, but please show me artwork you're creating with this palette, 
@jannik.f96 on instagram, is the best way.
